txt.en: <rgb=#FF0000>Completing Wildermore's Recovery will cancel this quest.</rgb>
Healing herbs are in short supply in Wildermore with the snows settling in, and you have been asked to search the Balewood for any surviving plants whose seeds may be used.

'I've heard many folk complaining about our dwindling supplies of healing herbs and plants, what with the snows settled in. The only place folk haven't scoured is the Balewood, where our people don't go.

'Will you search for any plants that resemble healing herbs you've seen on your travels? If you can bring them back intact, they shall be used to grow more.

'I would begin searching in the south-eastern Balewood.'
'You have gathered some promising-looking plants to bolster the stores of the healers of Forlaw. The seeds of these should be able to support a new crop of herbs.'
Plants that might be used for healing purposes can likely be found throughout the south-eastern edge of the Balewood.\n\nYou should search the south-eastern Balewood for promising plants.
Ealswith is in Forlaw.\n\nYou should return to Ealswith.
